headline: Is It Time To Reassess SBA Communications (SBAC) After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are looking at SBA Communications and wondering whether the current share price gives you good value, you are not alone. The stock closed at US$184.11, after a 1.9% decline over the last week, a 4.3% decline over the last month and year to date, and a 5.0% decline over the last year. The 3 year and 5 year returns stand at 34.3% and 26.0% declines respectively. Recent moves in SBA Communications have come alongside ongoing news interest in the tower and wireless infrastructure space,...
